document.full_text: daimler and rolls royce said on monday that they jointly held nearly 60 percent of tognum shares, calling it a milestone in the acquisition of the german engine maker.
document.title: daimler and rolls gain majority of engine maker
lines_and_colors: daimler and rolls royce said on monday that they jointly held nearly 60 percent of tognum shares, calling it a milestone in the acquisition of the german engine maker.
